actionErrorBecauseOffline.defaultMessage: Cannot perform this action you are offline or your connection seems too slow.

credentialError.defaultMessage: You don't have enough credentials to perform this action.

storageNotOpenedYet.defaultMessage: The local storage is not opened yet.

unexpectedError.defaultMessage: An unexpected error occurred. You can try again.

userExceedStorageLimit.defaultMessage: User exceeded the storage limit. Remove some images before adding new images.
